response.original_title: The Superliners: Twilight of an Era
response.overview: Before the days of jet travel, magnificent ocean liners such as the 'Queen Mary' and the 'Normandie' reigned over the Atlantic, setting standards of taste, luxury, and efficiency. ... THE SUPERLINERS: TWILIGHT OF AN ERA invites you to experience life aboard the last of the North Atlantic liners, the Queen Elizabeth 2, in a nostalgic look at the great vessels of a time gone by.
response.tagline: Relive the luxury and glory of the great ocean liners that once ruled the Atlantic.
response.title: The Superliners: Twilight of an Era
